actors.name: Users
actors.summary: Users interact with the protocol to create CDPs, borrow/repay stablecoins, stake/unstake tokens, and claim rewards.

actions.name: Stake tokens in DFIREStaking
actions.summary: Users stake staking tokens in the DFIREStaking contract to earn rewards.

actions.name: Unstake tokens in DFIREStaking
actions.summary: Users unstake their tokens from the DFIREStaking contract, withdrawing their initial stake.

actions.name: Claim rewards from DFIREStaking
actions.summary: Users claim accumulated rewards (reward tokens and collateral reward) from the DFIREStaking contract.

actions.name: Stake tokens in StabilityPool
actions.summary: Users stake tokens in the StabilityPool contract to earn rewards and participate in liquidations.

actions.name: Unstake tokens in StabilityPool
actions.summary: Users unstake their tokens from the StabilityPool contract.

actions.name: Claim rewards from StabilityPool
actions.summary: Users claim accumulated rewards (DFIRE tokens and collateral reward) from the StabilityPool contract.

actions.name: Open a new Safe (CDP)
actions.summary: Users open a new Collateralized Debt Position (Safe) by depositing ETH as collateral and borrowing DFID stablecoins.

actions.name: Close an existing Safe (CDP)
actions.summary: Users close an existing CDP, repaying their borrowed DFID and withdrawing their remaining ETH collateral.

actions.name: Borrow DFID stablecoins
actions.summary: Users borrow more DFID stablecoins against their existing ETH collateral in a CDP.

actions.name: Repay DFID stablecoins
actions.summary: Users repay a portion of their borrowed DFID stablecoins to reduce their debt in a CDP.

actions.name: Add ETH collateral
actions.summary: Users add more ETH collateral to their CDP to increase its collateralization ratio.

actions.name: Withdraw ETH collateral
actions.summary: Users withdraw a portion of their ETH collateral from their CDP.

actions.name: Redeem DFID for ETH
actions.summary: Users redeem DFID stablecoins for ETH collateral.

actions.name: Top up fees
actions.summary: Users pay fees to prioritize their CDPs in the redemption queue.

actors.name: Contract Owner
actors.summary: The contract owner manages the system, setting addresses, minting/burning tokens, and adding rewards.

actions.name: Mint DFID and DFIRE tokens
actions.summary: The contract owner or authorized minters mint new DFID and DFIRE tokens.

actions.name: Burn DFID and DFIRE tokens
actions.summary: The contract owner or authorized burners burn existing DFID and DFIRE tokens.

actions.name: Set contract addresses
actions.summary: The contract owner sets addresses for key contracts within the system.

actions.name: Add rewards to DFIREStaking
actions.summary: The contract owner adds reward tokens for distribution to stakers.

actions.name: Add collateral rewards to DFIREStaking
actions.summary: The contract owner adds collateral rewards for distribution to stakers.

actions.name: Set ETH price
actions.summary: The contract owner can set the ETH price.

actors.name: Liquidators
actors.summary: Liquidators monitor collateralization ratios and liquidate undercollateralized safes to maintain system solvency.

actions.name: Liquidate Safes
actions.summary: The liquidator calls the function to liquidate undercollateralized safes.
